ModMetaData.name: All Textile Medicine
ModMetaData.author: Nina Felwitch
ModMetaData.description:
While playing, it bothered me that medicine can only be crafted with vanilla coth and no other fabrics. So I looked into making mods for RimWorld and this is the result.
This mod allows crafting medicine with all fabrics and I also added a recipe to craft 5 medicine at a time. And I changed the workSkill from Intellectual to Medicine.
